20101228024905.000|20101228024907.000|TR0|been this -- in a strange way, I've been 
20101228024907.000|20101228024910.000|TR0|trying to move closer and closer and 
20101228024910.000|20101228024912.000|TR0|closer to the essence of old time show 
20101228024912.000|20101228024915.000|TR0|business.  You know, Vaudeville.
20101228024915.000|20101228024917.000|TR0|
20101228024917.000|20101228024920.000|TR0|When I was a kid, the movie they showed

20101228024923.000|20101228024925.000|TR0|Dandy" with Jimmy Cagney playing George M. 
20101228024925.000|20101228024928.000|TR0|Cohan.  And I used to watch that as a kid. 
20101228024928.000|20101228024930.000|TR0| I've seen it  a thousand times.  And I 
20101228024930.000|20101228024933.000|TR0|say -- as a kid, I thought that's 
20101228024933.000|20101228024935.000|TR0|entertainment.  That's what I want to be, 
20101228024935.000|20101228024938.000|TR0|an entertainer.
20101228024938.000|20101228024940.000|TR0|
20101228024940.000|20101228024943.000|TR0|But I'm watching this in the early 1970s, 
20101228024943.000|20101228024945.000|TR0|as a freckled kid in Brookline, 
20101228024945.000|20101228024948.000|TR0|Massachusetts.  And I thought that's what 
20101228024948.000|20101228024951.000|TR0|an entertainer is supposed to be.  So I 
20101228024951.000|20101228024953.000|TR0|went out and I took tap dancing lessons 
20101228024953.000|20101228024956.000|TR0|and I dreamed about playing theaters.
20101228024956.000|20101228024958.000|TR0|
20101228024958.000|20101228025001.000|TR0|Well, of course, I started out as a 
20101228025001.000|20101228025003.000|TR0|writer, which is way out in the periphery,
